text:
Time to see #TheHerd with my family. 

I hope the whole world sees this movie.

@NetflixNaija @netflix @Netflix_CA This is the reality of Nigerians for the past few years. Islamic terrorists and killer Fulani Herdsmen have made life miserable for many Nigerians.

The Nigerian government @NigeriaGov are complicit.
fullText:
Time to see #TheHerd with my family. 

I hope the whole world sees this movie.

@NetflixNaija @netflix @Netflix_CA This is the reality of Nigerians for the past few years. Islamic terrorists and killer Fulani Herdsmen have made life miserable for many Nigerians.

The Nigerian https://t.co/T5M9WeV0WM

quote.text:
Dear @NetflixNaija @netflix,

Please put the movie #TheHerd on Netflix global.  It's shouldn't be on @NetflixNaija alone.

Nigerians have been living the life shown in the movie for years. It's still our reality today.

We need the world to see it and understand what we have been going through.

Cheers.
